Sebastián RIFFO

Applied Mathematician | GitHub | LinkedIn

Former postdoc at Géoazur CNRS

Hi ! I’m Sebastián

chilean, applied mathematician, living in France after being a postdoc at Géoazur CNRS. Before that, I got a PhD and an M2 degree in Applied Mathematics from Université Paris Dauphine-PSL, and a Mathematical Engineering degree from Universidad de Chile.

I’m interested in working within a multidisciplinary team, on problems related with algorithm design, data science and visualization; as well as mathematical modeling, numerical analysis, and optimization. I’m also curious about scientific computing.

In a more personal note, among my hobbies are photography, biking, reading and traveling. I’m quite interested in politics.
